option.name: customScope
option.value: RTB-84892 Replace context menu item def for alignment to prevent sending styles right to a server. When text styles are changing we need to postpone updates on a server to prevent duplication of actions in history.

option.name: defaultScopeName
option.value: RTB-84892 Replace context menu item def for alignment to prevent sending styles right to a server. When text styles are changing we need to postpone updates on a server to prevent duplication of actions in history.

option.name: SEARCH_SCOPE
option.value: RTB-84892 Replace context menu item def for alignment to prevent sending styles right to a server. When text styles are changing we need to postpone updates on a server to prevent duplication of actions in history.
